entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning. A few rain showers beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
